title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with a bus and a red car.
caption: A white bus and a red car pass by while the ego vehicle drives straight on a city street.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving straight and maintaining a safe distance from the other cars on the road. The driver is cautious and pays attention to the traffic light and the surrounding vehicles to ensure safe driving.
